content.rendered:
Thirteen-year-old Sam suspects that his reclusive, mysterious neighbor, Mr. Smith, is actually the legend who was declared dead after a great battle twenty years ago. With crime on the rise, Sam makes it his mission to lure his neighbor out of hiding to save the town from chaos.

Directed By Julius Avery

Written By Bragi F. Schut

Stars: Sylvester Stallone. Javon ‘Wanna’ Walton. Pilou Asbæk
